info.title: Configuring &productnameshort; to require U2F (Universal 2nd Factor) keys for local login

abstract.para: The topic provides an introduction to configuring &productname; to require U2f keys for local login.

topic.para: To provide more security during the local login to &productname;, you can configure two-factor authentication using the pam-u2f framework and the U2F feature on YubiKeys and Security Keys.
For this, you must have a YubiKey device and install the required pam-u2f package on your system.

To set up U2F on your &productnameshort; system, you need to associate your key with your account on &productnameshort;. After that, configure your system to use the key. The procedure is described in the following sections.
